present.name: Présent
present.description: Use for actions in the present.

present-continu.name: Présent continu
present-continu.description: Use for continuous activity in the present. The emphasis is on the continuity.

futur-proche.name: Futur proche
futur-proche.description: Use for actions that are going to happen in the near future. This is commonly used in conversation.

futur-simple.name: Futur simple
futur-simple.description: Use for actions in the more distant, far-flung future.

passe-compose.name: Passé composé
passe-compose.description: Use for actions that happened in the past. The empasis is on the action.

imparfait.name: Imparfait
imparfait.description: Use to tell about past events. This is common in modern novels, and when telling a story.

pqp.name: Plus-que-parfait (Past Perfect)
pqp.description: Use for actions that happened in the past, before some other past actions.

passe-simple.name: Passé simple (Literary)
passe-simple.description: Use for literary narration in the past. This tense is slowly falling out of use. Knowing it helps when reading old novels.

passe-anterieur.name: Passé antérieur (Literary)
passe-anterieur.description: Use for literary narration of actions in the past, that happened before other past actions.

futur-anterieur.name: Futur antérieur (Futue in the Past)
futur-anterieur.description: Use to express the future from the point of view of the past.

present.name: Conditionnel Present
present.description: Use for possible actions in the present. Typically, this follows 'si' in the sentence.

passe.name: Conditionnel Passe
passe.description: Use for actions that were possible in the past.

present.name: Subjonctif Present
present.description: Use to express subjective feelings, judgements and decisions. Typically, this follows 'que' in the sentence.

passe.name: Subjonctif Passe
passe.description: Use for past subjective feelings, judgements and decisions.

present.name: Imperatif Present
present.description: Use to give orders and boss around.

passe.name: Imperatif Passe
passe.description: Use for orders given in the past.
